QuestionTxt: (I'm going to read you a list of specific elements or parts of the law.  For each, please tell me whether you think it is included in the (2010) health reform law, or not.) To the best of your knowledge, would you say the health reform law does or does not...cut benefits for people in the traditional Medicare program?
StudyNote: 752 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 751 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 410 who had no landline telephone.
